name: Shakespeare Universe
description:
The websites mentioned in this project are the Folgers Shakespeare Library website and the Shakespeare Birthplace Trust website. 

https://shakespeare.folger.edu/

https://www.shakespeare.org.uk/

The plays referenced are Macbeth, Hamlet, Titus Andronicus, Twelfth Night, A Midsummer Night's Dream, etc. All are written and belong to Shakespeare (which is the point of this project :))

Thanks for checking out my class project!
